Hello,

I am contacting you regarding an issue with my pedal set ordered on November 28th.

I have been using it for barely a month, and I recently noticed a malfunction. The hydraulic cylinder of the accelerator pedal is leaking, as you can see in the attached video.

Given the short period of use since receiving the product, I wanted to report this issue to you and find out what solutions can be considered (repair, replacement, or warranty coverage).

I remain available for any additional information.

Sincerely,
Illan

conversations.body_text: Hi grosso illan, We will send you a new one-way hydraulic throttle rod as a replacement. Also, please note that our unit is a pure hydraulic damper, designed to stabilize the travel and absorb vibration/shock. It is not a traditional gas spring, so it will not auto-return by itselfâ€”this is normal behavior. Could you please provide your order number and the recipient name, phone number, and shipping address so we can arrange the replacement shipment?

Hello,

Thank you for your quick response and for handling the replacement of the part.

I understand how the hydraulic damper works and that it is not a gas spring with automatic return. Thank you for this clarification.
